name: 練光祐
objective: 數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
schedule:
Week 1: What is feedback control? History, Basic concept, and Preliminaries
Week 2: Chapter 1, Introduction. Effects of feedback, Types of control systems
Week 3: Chapter 2.1-2.4, Laplace transform, its inversion, and Solving ODE
Week 4: Chapter 2.5-2.6, Impulse response, Transfer function, and Matlab tools
Chapter 3.1, Block diagrams
Week 5: Chapter 3.2-3.4, Signal-flow graphs, State diagram
Week 6: Chapter 4.1-4-6, Modeling of electrical networks, mechanical systems, Sensors, DC motors
Week 7: Chapter 4.7-4.10, Linearization, Time delays, and A sun-seeker system
Week 8: Chapter 5.1-5.7, State-transition matrix and equation, State equations v.s. TF, Characteristic equations, Eigenvalues, and Eigenvectors
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Chapter 5.8-5.12, Similarity transformation, Decompositions, Controllability and Observability
Week 11: Chapter 5.13-5.15, Some relationships, Magnetic-ball suspension system
Chapter 6.1, Stability
Week 12: Chapter 6.2-6.6, BIBO stability, Asymptotical stability, and Routh-Hurwitz Criterion
Week 13: Chapter 7.1-7.6, Time response, Response of a 2nd-order system
Week 14: Chapter 7.7-7.11, Position control system, Effects of adding poles and zeros, Dominant poles, Model reduction
Week 15: Chapter 8.1-8.6, Root-locus technique
Week 16: Chapter 9, Frequency-Domain Analysis
Week 17: Chapter 10, Design of Control Systems
Week 18: Final examination
materials:
Textbook:
Automatic Control Systems, 8e, by B. C. Kuo, and F. Golnaraghi
